name: Call of VII
description:
The Story

Ever since the powerful Crystal was broken, the world lost its proper order and many people became confused and hesitant. But with the unremitting efforts of those with strong faith, the situation finally turned around. Countless explorers have come to this legendary land either out of curiosity or thirst for power. With the help of the expedition, it’s time to regain the strength and restore the order and glory of the world.

What you will be experiencing...

  • Collect pieces to unseal the locked alter and regain your strength
  • Control the expedition to go down and solve whatever difficulties with the help of your faithful old friend
  • Get to the destined and inspiring end
